product_name: Sony MicroSDHC UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card - 32GB
long_description: The 32GB Sony Class 10 microSDHC card offers big storage in a tiny format. It's perfect for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices. Memory card offers reliable storage for media-rich applications, including high-definition photos, MP3s and even full 1080p videos. Rugged, waterproof design performs in temperatures ranging from -13deg to 185degF (-25deg to 85degC). Included SD adapter lets you swap the microSDHC card from mobile phone to camera or any other SD compatible host for easy file sharing and transfer.
short_description: The 32GB Sony Class 10 microSDHC card offers big storage in a tiny format. It's perfect for loading up on music, photos, video and games on your mobile devices.
